response.overview: A police shootout leaves four thieves dead during an explosive armed robbery attempt in Chicago. Their widows have nothing in common except a debt left behind by their spouses' criminal activities. Hoping to forge a future on their own terms, they join forces to pull off a heist.
response.tagline: Left with nothing. Capable of anything.
response.title: Widows

cast.name: Mark Lancaster
cast.character: Security Guard Day Shift at Mulligan's
